title: Local News
text: [Snowmageddon 10 years later: What Georgia has learned](/news/snowmageddon-10-years-later-what-georgia-has-learned) The winter storm brought the metro area to a complete halt and also changed the way many in Georgia looked at winter weather. [16-year-old critical after shooting in northwest Atlanta](/news/16-year-old-critical-after-shooting-in-northwest-atlanta) A 16-year-old was shot around 2 a.m. Friday in the 2700 block of Oldknow Drive NW in northwest Atlanta, according to Atlanta Police Department. [Man insists he doesn't smoke weed, Atlanta police find drugs in trunk](/news/man-insists-he-doesnt-smoke-weed-atlanta-police-find-drugs-in-trunk) A man from Alabama was recently arrested after Atlanta police officers found 35 pounds of marijuana in the trunk of his car. [Arson at construction site linked to Atlanta training center protests, officials say](/news/fire-atlanta-construction-site-boulevard-cop-city) Atlanta police are investigating a fire that damaged multiple construction vehicles at a site close to planned location for the city's controversial public safety training center. [Jamie Foxx back filming in Atlanta months after 'medical complication'](/news/jamie-foxx-filming-atlanta-medical-complication-recovery) Jamie Foxx is back at work filming in Atlanta months after he suffered a mysterious "medical complication" that left him temporarily unable to walk.
